hero.title: Your Medications Under Control
hero.subtitle: Never forget to take your medications on time. Axels Pills - your personal health assistant.

features.title: Why Choose Axels Pills?
features.mainDescription: No more guessing if you've taken your medications. Split intake into morning, afternoon and evening. We'll let you know when supplies are running low.
features.sectionDescription: We've created tools that make health control simple and convenient

reminder.title: Reminders
reminder.description: Set up reminders for each medication. Flexible schedule, repetitions and dosage.

schedule.title: Medication Schedule
schedule.description: Specify intake time - morning, afternoon, evening. The app will show how many days your medications will last.

history.title: History and Reports
history.description: Detailed intake statistics. Export reports for your doctor and track treatment progress.

reminders.title: Smart Reminders
reminders.description: Receive medication reminders at the time convenient for you

tracking.title: Progress Tracking
tracking.description: Control your medication schedule and track history

management.title: Medication Management
management.description: Keep all medication information in one place

about.title: About
about.subtitle: We created Axels Pills to make health management simpler and more accessible for everyone. Our platform helps thousands of people daily to follow their medication schedule and improve their quality of life.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Make medication management simple and accessible for everyone. We believe that health should not be complicated.

team.title: Team
team.description: We are a team of medical professionals, developers and designers united by the common goal of improving people's quality of life.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: For more than 5 years we have been helping people not to forget about medications, track treatment progress and communicate with doctors.

coreValues.title: Values
coreValues.description: Privacy, reliability and user care are the foundation of our approach to product development.

story.paragraph1: Axels Pills was born in the epicenter of deadlines and endless to-do lists. We noticed that in the modern world, a person is more likely to forget to take a necessary vitamin or important medication than to check social media notifications.
story.paragraph2: We went from a personal note on the phone to an intelligent system that takes the routine on itself. Axels Pills is your 'external brain' for health. We are here so you can focus on life, not on schedules.
story.paragraph3: Today Axels Pills is not just an app, but a partner in your health. We continue to improve our tools, add new features and make our users' lives easier every day.

footer.description: Your reliable assistant in medication control

privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us

intro.title: Introduction
intro.paragraph1: Welcome to Axels Pills! We value your trust and take the protection of your personal information seriously. This privacy policy describes what information we collect, how we use it and protect it.
intro.paragraph2: By using our service, you agree to the terms of this privacy policy. If you have any questions, please contact us.

encryption.title: Data Encryption
encryption.description: All your medical data is stored in encrypted form

access.title: Access Control
access.description: Only you have access to your medical records

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliance
gdpr.description: We comply with all European legislation requirements

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: You always know what data we collect and why

section1.title: 1. What Information We Collect
section1.medicalDesc: information about medications, intake schedule, reminders, dosage
section1.technicalDesc: IP address, device type, browser version to improve service
section1.usageDesc: how you use our app to improve functionality

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.item2: Improving service quality and user experience

section3.title: 3. Protecting Your Data
section3.intro: We use advanced security technologies to protect your data:

section4.title: 4. Sharing Information with Third Parties
section4.intro: We DO NOT sell your personal data to third parties. We may share information only in the following cases:
section4.item2: With service providers who help us provide services (cloud storage, analytics)
section4.item3: If required by law or court order
section4.item4: To protect users' rights and security

section5.title: 5. Your Rights
section5.intro: Under GDPR and Ukrainian law, you have the right to:
section5.item3: Deletion of your data ('right to be forgotten')
section5.item7: Withdraw consent to processing at any time

section6.title: 6. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
section6.outro: You can control cookies through your browser settings.

section7.title: 7. Data Storage and Deletion
section7.paragraph1: We store your data as long as you use the service. You can delete your account at any time through app settings.
section7.item1: Personal data is deleted within 30 days
section7.item3: Anonymized data may be retained for statistics

section8.title: 8. Children's Safety
section8.content: Our service is intended for users aged 13 and older. We do not knowingly collect data from children under 13. If you learn that a child has provided us with their data, please contact us.

section9.title: 9. International Data Transfer
section9.content: Your data is stored on servers in the European Union. If data is transferred outside the EU, we ensure an appropriate level of protection in accordance with GDPR.

section10.title: 10. Changes to Privacy Policy
section10.paragraph1: We may update this policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes:
section10.item2: Via push notifications in the app
section10.paragraph2: We recommend periodically reviewing this page for current information.

contact.title: Contacts
contact.intro: If you have questions about the privacy policy or data processing:

collection.title: What Data We Collect
collection.content: We collect personal information you provide during registration (name, email, phone), as well as data about medications and their intake schedule. This information is necessary to provide you with personalized service.

usage.title: How We Use Your Data
usage.content: Your data is used exclusively for providing services: sending reminders, tracking medication schedules and improving service quality. We never sell your personal information to third parties.

protection.title: How We Protect Your Data
protection.content: We use modern encryption and data protection methods. All data is stored on secure servers with limited access. We regularly conduct security audits.

sharing.title: Data Sharing with Third Parties
sharing.content: We do not share your personal data with third parties without your consent, except as required by law. We may share anonymized data for statistical research.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access your data, correct or delete it. You can also withdraw consent for personal data processing at any time by contacting us.

cookies.title: Cookie Usage
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve website performance and personalize content. You can configure cookie usage in your browser settings.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We store your data as long as you use our service. After deleting your account, your personal data will be deleted within 30 days.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes via email or app notifications.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about our privacy policy or data processing, contact us at: privacy@axelspills.com
